page.title: 20Traffic in Carlton
page.content: Although Carlton is only a small village, an incredible amount of traffic uses the main road every day, going to-and-from the M62. On average aproximately 364 vehicles pass through the village every hour. Starting from 572 between 8.OO a.m.and 9.OO a.m., and falling to 47O between 5.OO p.m. and 6.OO pp.m. The majority of the vehicles are cars, although vans and lorries come next on the list. This shows that a lot of commercial vehicles pass through the village. There will come a time probably in the near future, when Carlton will need a by-pass.
